name: HSP_ACCT_PXA_PRVCM
description: This table extracts the related multiple response ICD PX - ALT - Other Provider Comment (I HAR 3132) item.

columns.name: ACCT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the account record.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: This item will store historical data of scheduled payment records associated with the guarantor's payment plans.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple values associated with a specific group of data within this record.

columns.name: IPXA_OTH_PROV_CMNT
columns.description: The unique identifier for the account record.
